comments.content:
I took the vegetarian plunge about 5 months ago.  Your blog looks great and I think it will be very helpful in my quest to find recipes to please my family, who are less than thrilled by the change.

I bake a challah every week and my kids love french toast made from it.  This is a really tasty twist!

comments.author: Cassie
comments.content: Beautiful!  So creative, Michael, and it sounds great.  I saw Saturn peaches at the market earlier this summer and passed them over.  Now wondering what I missed!

comments.author: Kirsten
comments.content:
Thanks for checking my blog out - yours is beautiful, and this one looks especially gorgeous.

I love challah. My family vacations in Colorado sometimes, and there is this amazing tiny little bakery in the town we go to that makes the absolute best challah. I wake up at night dreaming of it sometimes (ha).

comments.author: sara
comments.content: Wow, that is so beautiful!  What a creative idea...looks really delicious.  :)
